headline: How Investors May Respond To Quanta Services (PWR) Record Backlog and AI-Driven Project Momentum
summary: Quanta Services recently reported strong quarterly results, highlighted by record financial figures and an all-time high backlog of US$35.8 billion, underscoring the company’s momentum in energy infrastructure and utility services. The ongoing surge in electricity demand associated with artificial intelligence deployment and renewables expansion is fueling Quanta’s project pipeline, which has been further reinforced by recent acquisitions to strengthen its position in the telecom and energy...
